Classes in com.lohika.alp.log4j used by com.lohika.alp.log4j
AppendersClosedException
          Represents a condition when operations are performed on already closed Appenders
LogNameStrategy
          Declares interface of an algorithm to give unique name prefixes for test method logs.
TestAppenderBuilder
          Defines interface to create appenders of the same type for given test methods.
TestAppenderDispatcher
          The TestAppenderDispatcher class forwards given LoggingEvent, which is issued by currently running test method, to related Appender instance.
 

Classes in com.lohika.alp.log4j used by com.lohika.alp.log4j.attributes
Appenders
          A container to keep all Appender instances of a test method, where each appender belongs to its own TestAppenderDispatcher
 

Classes in com.lohika.alp.log4j used by com.lohika.alp.log4j.strategies
LogNameStrategy
          Declares interface of an algorithm to give unique name prefixes for test method logs.
 

Classes in com.lohika.alp.log4j used by com.lohika.alp.log4j.xml
CloneableLayout
          Workaround for Cloneable interface that doesn't define clone.
